snippet: Belgian authorities released on Friday a man with previous militant links who had been detained a day earlier after two gas cylinders were found in a van he was driving....

headline.main: Judge: Dad Who Dropped Girl Off Bridge Ready to Stand Trial
headline.print_headline: Judge: Dad Who Dropped Girl Off Bridge Ready to Stand Trial

lead_paragraph: Belgian authorities released on Friday a man with previous militant links who had been detained a day earlier after two gas cylinders were found in a van he was driving.
